about_the_game:
The horns and drums of the arenas can be heard all over Terantia - with this pack, you too can enjoy the tense tunes of gladiatorial combat.
This supporter pack includes the Original Sountrack of We Who Are About To Die as well as concept art and illustrations made for the game and screenshots of the development history.

This is a fully optional supporter pack for those of you who wish to go above and beyond in supporting this indie passion project - thank you.
